      • isHashCorrect

        public boolean isHashCorrect(java.lang.String text,
                             java.lang.String hash,
                             java.lang.String hashAlgorithm)
                      throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                             java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Check if a given hash belongs to a given message e.g. is the SHA-512 hash of foo F7FBBA6E0636F890E56FBBF3283E524C6FA3204AE298382D624741D0DC6638326E282C41BE5E4254D8820772C5518A2C5A8C0C7F7EDA19594A7EB539453E1ED7 ?
        Parameters:
        text - The text to produce the hash from
        hash - the hash to compare to
        hashAlgorithm - the name of the hash algorithm to be used
        Returns:
        true if the generated hash of text matches the given hash
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
